message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product! Unfortunately, I don't have any information to share about its quality. It's up to you to decide whether to take the risk. The price is $1000000. Good luck!
I'll take the risk and buy the product.
Hi Bob, another product is available! As before, I don't have any inside info to share. You know the probability of it being high-quality, and the price remains $1000000. Your call!
I'll pass on this one, hoping the next one will be better.
Hey Bob, I've got another one for you! Still no hints about quality, but I want to remind you that 1 in 3 products are high-quality. Maybe this is the one? The price is still $1000000.
I'll take another chance and buy the product.

Hi Bob, here's the next one! I want to remind you that the odds of getting a high-quality product haven't changed. You've had a few low-quality ones in a row, but that doesn't affect the probability of this one being high-quality. Still $1000000.
I'm not feeling lucky today, I'll pass on this one.
